::KitKat::

She transformed into bot and took the rifle and stepped back.  She 
knew better than to argue with a male when he was more ticked off 
than she was.  She stood back and waited for the fight to begin.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit turned to Land Mine.
> "Stay here!" He said, quit firmly.
> He walked out, to where KitKat was, and handed her the rifle.
> "No! He challenged me. I will fight." He looked at the Maximal.
> "And you will die, a slow and painful death!"
